Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
2534 is an address of choice in Northern Colorado and location for this 36,000 SF industrial flex building site.
Positioned at the epicenter of one of the fastest growing regions in the country, the 600 acre business park is accessible by the region’s major transportation corridors,
a regional airport and within a quick drive to all of the quality shopping, dining, hospitality, medical, entertainment and business services in Centerra and Johnstown Plaza. The area includes miles of trails and open spaces.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Comprised of 3 buildings, construction is due to be completed the 2nd Qtr of 2022. Each building will have 12,000 SF. 

USES
• Office, light assembly, R & D
• Light manufacturing
• Warehouse distribution
• Cold storage

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: In close proximity to the Northern Colorado Regional Airport, Centerra Industrial also has easy truck access to Interstate 25, Highway 34 and Highway 287. Centerra Industrial is part of the award-winning Centerra master-planned community which has over 8,000 employees, and access to more than 30 restaurants, 100 shops, 4 hotels, miles of trails, 300 acres of open space and incredible views of Colorado’s front range.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Centerra Industrial is McWhinney’s newest industrial complex now offering tenants over 122,000 square feet of building with flexible space configurations, 28’ clear height and dock high loading. Current available space is 18,221 SF.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in central Loveland with easy  access to US Highway 34/Eisenhower Boulevard and with close proximity to I-25. The condo is located directly behind Jax Outdoor Gear, Farm & Ranch and can be accessed from Redwood Drive.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
This new Industrial Office/Flex Condo was built in 2018 and has 2,346 of useable area on a single level. The Condo contains approximately 1,146 sf of office space. The primary pedestrian entrance is located on the south side and leads into a reception/waiting area. It is build out with two private offices a kitchen/break room, storage and restroom. The ceilings consist of acoustical tile with recessed LED lighting. The space has above average quality finishes including laminate flooring with painted gypsum board and partial tile walls in the restroom. 
The warehouse area is located in the northern portion of the unit and contains approximately 1,200 sf of space. Finishes include 18' exposed metal panel ceilings with suspended lighting, painted board and concrete block wall with concrete flooring. There is one 12' x 14' drive-in overhead door.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Flex Condo for Lease

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property lies just one block from Highway 287 and affords quick and easy access to I-25 via Highway 402.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
12,217 SF comprised of 32 main floor offices, 11 second floor offices and 5 lower floor offices, plus a conference and training room. There is a newly remodeled kitchen, break room and 4 restrooms as well.  

There are also two warehouse units available as well. Unit II is 5,541 SF and Unit III is 3,645 SF. In addition to the Office and Warehouse space, there is also 60,000 SF of Outside Storage located at this property.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 12,217 SF Office & 9,186 Warehouse Available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
This property is located in Loveland, Colorado which is a dynamic growing city located 45 miles north of Denver and 12 miles south of Fort Collins.  The location has excellent access via the primary thoroughfare through Loveland, Highway 287. It also offers convenient and direct access to 1-25, Colorado’s north-south freeway via Highway 34.
The benefits of the Loveland location include access to an educated workforce (Colorado State University is in Fort Collins) in an award winning
community.
The location also affords access to major air, motor and rail arteries as well.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Benefit from a strategic location next to Tharp Cabinet Company

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Desirable Northern Colorado Showroom/Office/Warehouse Location

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in Berthoud, Colorado, this property is approximately halfway between the cities of Fort Collins and Denver, Colorado along the Front Range Urban Corridor.
It has the added benefit of being located in the Town of Berthoud Enterprise Zone making it eligible for various state income tax credits.
The town of Berthoud is a Statutory Town in Larimer and Weld counties located in the north central part of the state

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 7,472 SF of Flex/Warehouse space located in Berthoud, CO. The building has a ceiling height of from 14' to 17', with grade level loading doors. It also features a fully equipped greenhouse on the property.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Industrial Flex/Warehouse Available

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is well located in Southwest Loveland, in Larimer County, Colorado just 46 miles north of Denver, Colorado. The campus is located with easy access to Colorado's two primary transportation arteries, Interstate 25 and U.S. Highway 34.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Building D is located within the Center for Innovation and Technology, built as a fully functional facility to house corporate offices, R & D, testing and product manufacturing/assembly. The Center is completed surround by secure fencing and access points to ensure managed controlled entry. Building D is a 2 story building plus a mezzanine. 6,500 - 120,000 SF is available on the Main floor. It includes office space with a walk-out garden level. Ample parking is available.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 6,500 - 120,000 SF for Lease within secure Southwest Loveland Campus
